name: Nightsparrow in Dreams
description:
This is a Touhou Project fangame made in a few days for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 8.

Story
Mystia enters Wriggle's dream world to give her a rude awakening. It's time to hang out, after all, not time to sleep!

Gameplay
You'll figure it out. I believe in you.
Hint: Try circling around things once you have a few friends.

Controls
Arrow keys or WASD or gamepad D-pad to move.
F11 to toggle fullscreen.
F10 to change window size.
